GSD.description:
ext4: don't BUG if someone dirty pages without asking ext4 first

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.238 by commit 0d3a6926f7e8be3c897fa46216ce13b119a9f56a. For more details please see the references link.
